Package com.treasure.hunt.game

Class GameEngine

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.treasure.hunt.game.GameEngine
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    HideAndSeekGameEngine
    public class GameEngine
extends java.lang.Object
    This is the engine which runs a simulation of a treasure hunt.

    • Method Detail

      • located

        protected static boolean located​(java.util.List<GeometryItem<org.locationtech.jts.geom.Point>> geometryItemsList,
                                 org.locationtech.jts.geom.Point treasurePosition)
        Parameters:
        geometryItemsList - searcher path
        treasurePosition - the position of the treasure
        Returns:
        true if the searcher located the treasure successfully. false, otherwise.

      • init

        public Move init()
        initialize searcher and treasure positions.
        Returns:
        a Move, since the initialization must be displayed.

      • move

        public Move move()
        This simulates just one step of the simulation. The searcher begins since we want not force him, to take a initial hint, he eventually do not need, f.e. if he works randomized!
        Returns:
        the Move, happened in this step.

        protected void verifyMovement​(Movement movement,
                              org.locationtech.jts.geom.Point initialSearcherPosition)
        Verifies whether the performed Movement movement by the Searcher followed the rules.
        Parameters:
        movement - which gets verified
        initialSearcherPosition - initial searcher position
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - when the Movement is not valid.

      • outOfMap

        public boolean outOfMap​(org.locationtech.jts.geom.Coordinate coordinate)
        Parameters:
        coordinate - the Coordinate, we want to test, whether it lies outside the playing area.
        Returns:
        true, if the coordinate lies outside the playing area. false, otherwise.
